content: ltc scarf learn to crochet by allena williams i developed this scarf for teaching the basics of crochet you can make it as long as you would like by chaining more at the beginning make sure it s divisible by 3 you may also make it as wide as you like by repeating the row in order until it s the width you d wish then complete the edging materials 1 skein of worsted weight yarn i use caron simply soft h hook body of scarf chain 151 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet across 150 sts row 2 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet across row 3 chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet across row 4 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet across row 5 chain 1 single_crochet across edging you will now be working all the way around the scarf turn chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next stitch chain 1 skip next stitch *1 double_crochet in the next 2 stitches chain 1 skip next stitch repeat from * around the corners are made by chain 3 instead of chain 1 end with a chain 3 and join in the top of the beginning chain 3 weave in all ends and enjoy
